title: Muted User
description:
管理員禁止某使用者發言，需要使用者登入且為管理員身份，管理員不能禁自己的發言，也不能禁其他管理員的發言

禁第一次，使用者一天內不能發言；禁第二次，三天內不能發言；禁第三次，七天內不能發言，再禁第四次以上，則使用者永久不能發言 by Tsai-Chieh

（注意：請使用測試使用者 uid: eIQXtxPrBFPW5daGMcJSx4AicAQ2）
name: mutedUser

title: 個人即時比分頁-我的預測
description: Get the user predictions including match information on today by TsaiChieh
name: my_predictions

Success 200.description: return the numeric value corresponding to the scheduled time—the number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC
match status, 2 is scheduled, 1 is in progress, 0 is end
return image id, the URL is: https://assets.b365api.com/images/team/{image_size: s, m, b}/{image_id}.png, ex: https://assets.b365api.com/images/team/b/3414.png
away team information like home Object field, description omitted here
spread information with the newest spread or according to user prediction option
the newest spread id (which will change based on the request time)
前端可不用理，後端 debug 用
讓分主隊台盤顯示（通常主隊顯示客隊就不顯示）
讓分客隊台盤顯示（通常客隊顯示主隊就不顯示）
玩家下注的讓分 id，若沒下就是 null
玩家押主或客，若沒下就是 null，可藉由此欄位來判斷要加受讓字, ex: 當 away_tw 有值，而玩家下注 home 時，則要加受字
totals information with the newest spread or according to user prediction option 前端目前暫時用不到，以防萬一還是先給 totals object
the newest spread id (which will change based on the request time)
前端可不用理，後端 debug 用
讓分主隊台盤顯示（通常主隊顯示客隊就不顯示）
玩家下注的讓分 id，若沒下就是 null
玩家押大分或小分，若沒下就是 null，可藉由此欄位來判斷要加受讓字, ex: 當 over_tw 有值，而玩家下注 under 時，則要加受字

examples.content:

 {

title: 傳送訊息
description: The front-end can only listen to the realtime database and ignore the results of successful JSON responses, and the data structure of the realtime database can refer to the Success-Response of this document by Tsai-Chieh
name: Create_or_reply_a_message_file

Parameter.description: currently only public, may increase in the future
message type, the value enum are: text, image/jpeg, image/png, video/mp4, video/quicktime. If the message content is not plain text, message must be a URL

Success 200.description: reply data, include message and user object, not repeat again
return message content, plain text or URL
unique id which firebase automated generated for message
whether the message has been deleted, -1: admin delete, 0: user retract (收回), 1: user delete (刪除), 2: normal (default)
return random string generated by the front-end
user URL, must choose from titles field, 若為一般玩家，則為 null
user role, -1: locked user, 0: incomplete profile which registered user, 1: normal user, 2: god user, 9: admin

title: deleteMessage
description: The front-end can only listen to the message which masked after deleting action in the realtime database by Tsai-Chieh
name: Soft_delete_message

Parameter.description: currently only public, may increase in the future
delete action for message, only accept -1 (admin delete), 0 (user retract), 1 (user delete)

examples.title: 400-Response

title: Get matches
description: Get each match information included home & away team name and match scheduled time by TsaiChieh
name: match_information

Success 200.description: return the numeric value corresponding to the scheduled time—the number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC
match status, 2 is scheduled, 1 is in progress, 0 is end
return image id, the URL is: https://assets.b365api.com/images/team/{image_size: s, m, b}/{image_id}.png, ex: https://assets.b365api.com/images/team/b/3414.png
away team information like home Object field, description omitted here
handicap information included the newest spread & totals
the newest spread information (which will change based on the request time)
the newest totals information like handicap.spread field, description omitted here

title: 個人預測頁-預測結果
description: User check own prediction form which is settled by Tsai-Chieh
name: Check_own_prediction_form

Success 200.description: 賽事的狀態，2 未來賽事，1 正在打，0 結束，-1 延遲（API 問題），-2 延後，-3 取消
賽事開打時間的 unix 表示法
主隊資訊（客隊資訊同邏輯，不再贅述）
主隊隊員名（通常只有電競足球只欄位才會有值）
讓分物件，若使用者未下注讓分，則此物件幾乎會是 null
讓分原始盤口（前端不用顯示，給後端 Debug）
讓分主隊台盤顯示（通常主隊顯示客隊就不顯示）
讓分客隊台盤顯示（通常客隊顯示主隊就不顯示）
使用者當初下注對象，ex: 主 (home) or 客 (away)
讓分的過盤結果（已乘上固定賠率）：-2 未結算（可能比賽未如預期結束或是程式有問題）、-1（輸）、0（平手）、0.95（贏）、0.5（贏）、-0.5（輸），詳細規則 ref from https://docs.google.com/document/d/1n06wVoPZ94OwC1Ri_9t4MlVI2ukjt4QijT3Z1qEMta8/edit
可藉由此欄位直接判定過盤結果：1 有無過盤、0 平盤、-1 未過盤，若 result 是 -2，則此欄位會是 null
注數乘以賠率（前端可顯示這個即可），若 result 是 -2，則此欄位會是 null
大小分物件（和讓分邏輯很雷同，以下只描述不同之細節），若使用者未下注大小分，則此物件所有會是 null
大分台盤顯示（和讓分不同，大小分只在大分顯示即可）

title: 預測頁-送出預測
description: User send own prediction form by Tsai-Chieh
name: Create_or_update_own_prediction_form

Parameter.description: -1: normal user used, 0: free, 1: sell, just god user can determine sell or free
spread information array, spread[0] is spread id, spread[1] enum are: home, away, spread[2] is chip number, max is 3, min is 1
totals information array, totals[0] is totals id, totals[1] enum are: under, over, totals[2] is chip number, max is 3, min is 1

Success 200.description: spread[0] spread information array which is successful
totals[0] totals information array which is successful

Error 4xx.description: Forbidden 因為大神無法再更新已下注內容

examples.title: 400-Response
New User:

Success 200.description: 該關注對象是否是該登入使用者的最愛，若使用者未登入即為 false
該關注對象是否是該登入使用者的追蹤聯盟，若使用者未登入即為空陣列
該關注對象是否為大神，只要為任一聯盟的大神就為 2，只要是一般玩家 1，others_league_id, others_league_name, others_rank, others_title 皆為 null
該關注對象預設稱號的聯盟編號
該關注對象預設稱號的聯盟名
